column1: '''Concerning Hobbits''' is the second track of ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring - Original Motion Picture Soundtrack]]'' by [[Howard Shore]]. It sets the cheerful and simple [[Hobbits|Hobbit]] theme that is frequently repeated throughout the movie
column2: played on the Violin and Pennywhistle.
